en: The new computer is running smooth as butter. You've been able to get a decent amount more work done every day. It's nothing life changing, but an added thirty minutes of solid work adds up.
You go to bed, feeling extremely guilty. When you explain the situation to Dominique the next day, he responds with compassion.
dominique::"To be honest, I put extra items on the list - I like to aim high so that I achieve more than I otherwise would've. That you've even gotten this close is impressive!"
